Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 22 Piercing, Can gravely Poison a hit target.  This poison prevents the afflicted target from healing and deals poison damage at the start of each of its turns
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 17 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Mace, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Bludgeoning plus 21 Fire
Equipment Actions.Action 4: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 24 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Pit Fiend makes 4 attacks, one with its Bite, one with its Claw, one with its Mace, and one with its Tail

Abilities.Ability 1: Fear Aura, Any creature hostile towards the Pit Fiend makes a Wisdom saving throw, or is frightened by the Pit Fiend's unnerving pressence
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Pit Fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Weapons, The Pit Fiend's weapon attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 4: Innate Spellcasting, The Pit Fiend can innately cast a few spells

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
